text: Dum ahli kitab lakee bak gata A Tapeutron sigra kitab meutuah Sideh di langet peutron keu kamoe Dilee pih meunoe ka lheuh jipeugah Leubeh nibak nyan ka lheuh jilakee f Bak Musa dilee masa nyang sudah Jilakee bak deuh jikalon Tuhan Beu leupah that trang bek na meuilah Teuka geulanteue jitak awaknyan Sabab awak nyan lalem that leupah Aneuk leumo lom teuma jiseumah Ate jiminah kon le bak Allah Biek meunan kamoe hana meuitong Bandum atra nyan kamoe peumeu‘ʻah Teuma kamoe bri keu Nabi Musa d Mvwʻjizat raya nyata sileupah
